author: Special Correspondent
text: A special sanction of Rs. 40 lakh has been released for taking up repair and maintenance of three major road works and for construction of crematoria at two centres in Tirumalairayanpattinam commune panchayat. An official release here on Thursday said the roads – Periyapalli Road will be re-laid at an estimate of Rs. 9.63 lakh; Melavanjure Achary Road at Rs. 7.20 lakh; Allikulam Street, Mathakovil Street, and Vellan Street at an expenditure of Rs. 13.86 lakh. This apart, the crematorium at Melaiyur and Kattapillai would be built at an expenditure of about Rs. 9.24 lakh, the release added. The works were taken up on priority basis based on the recommendations of the Karaikal District Development Council and MP’s Local Area Development Scheme.
title: Damaged roads to be re-laid in Karaikal
